name: Cryptodate
intro: A novel NFT platform composed of on-chain date NFTs
introduce: Cryptodate is a novel NFT platform composed of 36,525 dates, each day between 1950 to 2049. Each date is an on-chain NFT. Owning dates grants access to exclusive clubs. Beyond NFT ownership, each date yields Cryptodate tokens (CDT), providing immediate value and access to the community.
